quotes.quote: You need new roads to discover new places!
Create a compelling vision, one that takes people to a new place, and then translate that vision into a reality.
There's nothing more thrilling than arriving in a new place on your own and feeling the sense of possibility and excitement that brings with it.
Transitions are almost always signs of growth, but they can bring feelings of loss. To get somewhere new, we may have to leave somewhere else behind.
Every time you tear a leaf off a calendar, you present a new place for new ideas and progress.
Change is always good. It brings you to a new place.
New places always help us look at life differently.
Keep travelling. You will discover new paths and new places.
The quickest way to learn about a new place is to know what it dreams of.
The true voyage of discovery is not a journey to a new place; it is learning to see with new eyes.

If you want to be a new man you have to stay in new places, and do new things, with people who never knew you before. If you go back to the same old ways, what else can you be but the same old person?
To wake for the first time in a new place can be like another birth.
Don't mistake a new place for a new you.
To start at a new place is always to feel incompetent and unwanted.
Arrival at a new destination only occurs from leaving your current location.
If you don't know where you are going, you might wind up someplace else.
Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
Everyone thinks that a new place or a new identity will jumpstart a new life.
Get some money, buy a red coffeepot, move out. Find a new place to plug it in.
Escape and breathe the air of new places.
